message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, as it's worth $12,000 to you and represents a significant investment for me. Considering its high quality and unique features, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it allows you to secure this valuable asset at a discount. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
